name: Don't Go To Hell
description:
Can you get to Heaven in this puzzle themed card game? Only one way to find out!

Instructions:

Click on card piles and travel down different paths to avoid going to hell. Various card piles change different stats, school increases intelligence, fun increases happiness, etc. If you're nervous about getting a bad card or need to increase the rate of something, try a well timed prayer (bottom left corner). Your ultimate goal is to figure out the way to avoid going to hell, this could be the right combination of stats, the right prayer, etc. Best of luck!

Background:

This game was made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 69. 

Credits:

Programming and game design by Ian
